mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(grop_purchs_prodct_seq) AS grop_purchs_prodct_seq FROM grop_purchs_tb;

SELECT prodct_nme , grop_purchs_prodct_seq , grop_purchs_seq , ordr_star_dat , ordr_end_dat , min_ordr_amont , max_ordr_amont , exist_pric , sel_pric , titl , stat FROM grop_purchs_tb WHERE prodct_nme LIKE CONCAT ('%', '${prodctNme}','%')
AND stat LIKE '%%'
AND stat LIKE '모집중'
AND stat LIKE '배송중'
AND stat LIKE '배송완료'
AND sel_pric <=' ${LastSelPric}'
AND sel_pric >= '${firstSelPric}'
AND sel_pric >= '${firstSelPric}' AND sel_pric <='${LastSelPric}'
AND ordr_end_dat <=' ${ordrEndDat}'
AND ordr_star_dat >= '${ordrStarDat}'
AND ordr_star_dat >= '${ordrStarDat}' AND ordr_end_dat <= '${ordrEndDat}'
ORDER BY grop_purchs_prodct_seq LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstRecordIndex}; ;

SELECT prodct_nme , grop_purchs_prodct_seq , grop_purchs_seq , ordr_star_dat , ordr_end_dat , min_ordr_amont , max_ordr_amont , exist_pric , sel_pric , titl , stat FROM grop_purchs_tb WHERE grop_purchs_prodct_seq = #{gropPurchsProdctSeq};
